title: Validation of the Commercial Potential of a Novel in silico Approach for Drug Discovery and Development
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The funds further the development and benchmarking of a computational approach using machine learning to identify novel ligands that have a biological activity Agriculture, Food and Drink,Chemicals,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText: We have developed a computational approach to identify new molecules, which could be drugs, that bind to biological molecules by learning from existing information. Use software to discover novel molecules to regulate biological activity. Use the method as a fee for service for industry. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Chemicals,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
